                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da02              BGE      |L1.10|
000004  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
000008  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.10|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)

;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)

;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';

                  |L1.22|

00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22
00001e  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8              ;22
000020  d3f9              BCC      |L1.22|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }
000022  4770              BX       lr
;;;27     
                          ENDP

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)
000024  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;
000026  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;32     do i++;
;;;33     while ((lcd_buffer[i]!=xy)&&(i<LCD_SIZE));
00002a  4af6              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.44|
00002c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;32
000030  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;32
000032  5c13              LDRB     r3,[r2,r0]

000036  d001              BEQ      |L1.60|
000038  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8
00003a  d3f7              BCC      |L1.44|
                  |L1.60|

;;;35     return i;
;;;36     }
00003c  4770              BX       lr
;;;37     
                          ENDP

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
00003e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)

;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;

                  |L1.74|

000054  5463              STRB     r3,[r4,r1]

;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
000060  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000062  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000064  4de9              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
000066  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00006a  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
00006c  f04f0105          MOV      r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
000070  4be5              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
000072  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
000076  f04f0700          MOV      r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.122|
00007a  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
00007c  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.144|
00007e  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000080  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
000084  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.144|
000086  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
000088  d902              BLS      |L1.144|
00008a  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
00008e  e007              B        |L1.160|
                  |L1.144|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000090  eb030201          ADD      r2,r3,r1
000094  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
000098  f1040430          ADD      r4,r4,#0x30
00009c  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
00009e  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.160|
0000a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;55
0000a4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
0000a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
0000a8  d1e7              BNE      |L1.122|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
0000aa  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0000ac  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;153    {
0000ae  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;
;;;156    char s[10];
;;;157    char minus='+';

;;;158    char zero_on;
;;;159    char simb_num;
;;;160    
;;;161    if(in<0)

;;;162    	{
;;;163    	in=-in;

;;;165    	}
;;;166    
;;;167    for(i=0;i<10;i++)

;;;168    	{

;;;170    	in/=10;

0000dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;167

;;;171    	}   
;;;172    
;;;173    zero_on=1;

;;;174    simb_num=0;

;;;175    
;;;176    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)

;;;177    	{
;;;178    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;179    	     {
;;;180    	     s[i]=0x20;

                  |L1.242|
0000f2  b143              CBZ      r3,|L1.262|

0000f8  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;178
0000fc  d103              BNE      |L1.262|
0000fe  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;178
000100  dd01              BLE      |L1.262|
000102  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
000104  e008              B        |L1.280|
                  |L1.262|
;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

000108  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
00010c  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
00010e  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;

000116  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.280|
000118  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;176
00011c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
00011e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
000120  dae7              BGE      |L1.242|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
000122  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
000124  d104              BNE      |L1.304|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
000126  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000128  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00012c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00012e  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]
                  |L1.304|
;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)
000130  b18a              CBZ      r2,|L1.342|
;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000132  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000134  e007              B        |L1.326|
                  |L1.310|
;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

00013a  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
00013e  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000140  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;196
000144  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.326|
000146  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;196
000148  dcf5              BGT      |L1.310|
;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';
00014a  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
00014e  54a8              STRB     r0,[r5,r2]
;;;201         simb_num++;     
000150  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
000154  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.342|
;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);
000156  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000158  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
00015c  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

000162  e006              B        |L1.370|
                  |L1.356|
000164  eba00601          SUB      r6,r0,r1
000168  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00016a  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]
00016c  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;205
000170  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;205
                  |L1.370|
000172  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;205
000174  dbf6              BLT      |L1.356|
;;;208    	}
;;;209    }
000176  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;211    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;212    void long2lcd_mmm(signed long in,char xy,char des)

;;;213    {

;;;241    	     }
;;;242    	else 
;;;243    	     {
;;;244    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

0001d6  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;245    	     zero_on=0;

;;;246    	     simb_num++;

                  |L1.482|

;;;247    	     }
;;;248    	 }
;;;249    	          
;;;250    if(minus=='-')

0001ee  d104              BNE      |L1.506|
;;;251         {
;;;252         s[simb_num++]=minus;

;;;262         }
;;;263

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;271    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;272    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)

;;;273    {

;;;313         }    
;;;314    if(des)
0002c8  b18b              CBZ      r3,|L1.750|
;;;315         {
;;;316         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
0002ca  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
0002cc  e007              B        |L1.734|
                  |L1.718|
;;;317              {
;;;318              s[i]=s[i-1];
0002ce  eb070500          ADD      r5,r7,r0
0002d2  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
0002d6  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0002d8  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;316
0002dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;316
                  |L1.734|
0002de  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;316
0002e0  dcf5              BGT      |L1.718|
;;;319              }
;;;320         s[des]='.';
0002e2  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0002e6  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;321         simb_num++;     
0002e8  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0002ec  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.750|
;;;322         }
;;;323    	
;;;324    n=(20*y)+x;
0002ee  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0002f2  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0002f6  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;325    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
0002f8  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;326    	{
;;;327         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
0002fc  4a41              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
0002fe  e006              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.768|
000300  eba10500          SUB      r5,r1,r0
000304  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
000306  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
000308  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;325
00030c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;325
                  |L1.782|
00030e  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;325
000310  dbf6              BLT      |L1.768|
;;;328    	}
;;;329    
;;;330    
;;;331    
;;;332    }
000312  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;333    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;334    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;335    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
000316  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;336    {
000318  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00031a  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00031c  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;337    char i;
;;;338    char n;
;;;339    bin2bcd_int(in);
00031e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;340    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000322  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000324  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000326  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;341    i=(y*20)+x;
00032a  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
00032e  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
000332  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;342    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000334  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;343    	{ 
;;;344    	if(n<des)
;;;345    		{
;;;346    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000338  4b33              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
00033a  4d32              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.828|
00033c  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;344
00033e  d201              BCS      |L1.836|
000340  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000342  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.836|
;;;347    		}   
;;;348    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
000344  d307              BCC      |L1.854|
000346  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000348  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
00034a  d004              BEQ      |L1.854|
;;;349    		{
;;;350    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
00034c  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.872|
;;;351    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
00034e  eb050601          ADD      r6,r5,r1
000352  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.854|
;;;352       		}   
;;;353    	i--;	
000356  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00035a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00035c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;342
000360  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;342
000362  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;342
000364  d3ea              BCC      |L1.828|
;;;354    	}
;;;355    }
000366  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.872|
000368  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;350
00036a  e7f4              B        |L1.854|
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1503   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1504   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
00036c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1505   {
00036e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000370  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000372  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1506   char temp;
;;;1507   temp=find(xy);
000374  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1508   
;;;1509   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1510   if(temp!=255)
000378  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00037a  d00c              BEQ      |L1.918|
;;;1511   while (*adr)
;;;1512   	{
;;;1513   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
00037c  4a21              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
;;;1514   	temp++;
00037e  e007              B        |L1.912|
                  |L1.896|
000380  eb000305          ADD      r3,r0,r5              ;1513
000384  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;1513
000388  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1513
00038a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00038e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.912|
000390  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1511
000392  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1511
000394  d1f4              BNE      |L1.896|
                  |L1.918|
;;;1515       	}
;;;1516   }
000396  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1517   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1307   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1308   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
000398  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1309   {
00039a  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00039c  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1310   char i;
;;;1311   char n;
;;;1312   
;;;1313   bin2bcd_int(in);
00039e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1314   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0003a2  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0003a4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003a6  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1315   i=find(xy);
0003aa  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0003ac  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1316   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0003b0  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;1317   	{
;;;1318      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
0003b4  4a14              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
;;;1319      		{
;;;1320      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
0003b6  4d13              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.952|
0003b8  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.964|
0003ba  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1318
0003bc  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1318
0003be  d001              BEQ      |L1.964|
0003c0  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003c2  e015              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.964|
;;;1321      		}
;;;1322      	else 
;;;1323      		{
;;;1324      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0003c4  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
0003c6  d202              BCS      |L1.974|
0003c8  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003ca  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003cc  e010              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.974|
;;;1325      		else if (n==des)
0003ce  d108              BNE      |L1.994|
;;;1326      			{
;;;1327      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0003d0  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0003d4  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1328      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0003d6  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003da  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003dc  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0003e0  e006              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.994|
;;;1329      			} 
;;;1330      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
0003e2  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003e4  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0003e6  d003              BEQ      |L1.1008|
0003e8  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003ec  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1008|
;;;1331      		}  
;;;1332   		
;;;1333   	i--;	
0003f0  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0003f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003f6  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;1316
0003fa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1316
0003fc  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1316
0003fe  d3db              BCC      |L1.952|
;;;1334   	}
;;;1335   }
000400  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
000402  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.1028|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1032|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1036|
                          DCD      zero_on
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1545   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1546   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
000410  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1547   {
;;;1548   signed int tempSI;
;;;1549   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1550   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1551   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
000412  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000414  da01              BGE      |L1.1050|
000416  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000418  e003              B        |L1.1058|
                  |L1.1050|
;;;1552   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
00041a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
00041c  db01              BLT      |L1.1058|
00041e  eba00001          SUB      r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1058|
;;;1553   
;;;1554   return (char)tempSI;
000422  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1555   }
000424  4770              BX       lr
;;;1556   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;358    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;359    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
000426  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;360    {
00042a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00042c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;361    char iii;
;;;362    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;363    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;364    		
;;;365    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
00042e  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000432  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;366    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000436  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
000438  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00043a  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;367    tempii*=32;
00043e  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;368    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000442  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
000446  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;369         
;;;370    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
000448  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
00044a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00044c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;371    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000450  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000452  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
000456  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;372    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
00045a  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00045c  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000460  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;373    
;;;374    iii=find(simbol);
000464  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000466  f7fffffe          BL       find
00046a  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;375         
;;;376    if(dt[0]=='U')
00046c  f89d0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;377        { 
;;;378        if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;379       		{
;;;380        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
000470  f8dfb720          LDR      r11,|L1.2964|
;;;381       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;382        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;383       		}
;;;384        	
;;;385    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;386    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;387       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;388       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;389    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;390       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;391    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;392       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;393    //	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;394        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
000474  f8df9720          LDR      r9,|L1.2968|
000478  f04f0740          MOV      r7,#0x40              ;366
;;;395        	{
;;;396        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00047c  f04f0630          MOV      r6,#0x30
;;;397         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
000480  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
;;;398         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;399         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;400         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;401         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;402         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;403         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
000484  f04f0523          MOV      r5,#0x23
000488  f04f0420          MOV      r4,#0x20              ;385
00048c  2855              CMP      r0,#0x55              ;376
00048e  d07e              BEQ      |L1.1422|
;;;404         	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;405         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;406         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;407         	}	                   
;;;408    	else      	
;;;409            {
;;;410     		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;411         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;412         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;413         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;414         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;415         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;416         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;417         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;418         	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;419         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;420         	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;421    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;422      		}	   
;;;423         }   
;;;424         
;;;425    else if(dt[0]=='P')
;;;426    	{
;;;427      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;428        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;429        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;430        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
000490  21cf              MOVS     r1,#0xcf
;;;431        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';
000492  f04f0cd1          MOV      r12,#0xd1
000496  2850              CMP      r0,#0x50              ;425
000498  d07a              BEQ      |L1.1424|
;;;432    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;433        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;434    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;435        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;436    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;437        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;438    	//lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;439         	
;;;440        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;441         	{
;;;442             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;443         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;444        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;445        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;446        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;447         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;448         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;449         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;450             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;451         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;452         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;453         	}	                   
;;;454        	else      	
;;;455         	{
;;;456          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;457         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;458         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;459         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;460          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;461          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;462          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;463          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;464          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;465         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;466          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;467    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;468      		}     	
;;;469         }   
;;;470    
;;;471    else if(dt[0]=='Q')
;;;472    	{
;;;473      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;474        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;475        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;476        lcd_buffer[iii++]='U';
;;;477        lcd_buffer[iii++]='â';
00049a  22e2              MOVS     r2,#0xe2
00049c  2851              CMP      r0,#0x51              ;471
00049e  d078              BEQ      |L1.1426|
;;;478    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='û';
;;;479        lcd_buffer[iii++]='õ';
;;;480    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;481    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;482    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;483    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;484    		     	
;;;485        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;486         	{
;;;487             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;488         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;489        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;490        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;491        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;492         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;493         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;494         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;495             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;496         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;497         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;498         	}	                   
;;;499        	else      	
;;;500         	{
;;;501          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;502         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;503         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;504         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;505          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;506          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;507          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;508          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;509          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;510         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;511          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;512    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;513      		}     	
;;;514         }   
;;;515    
;;;516    else if(dt[0]=='B')
0004a0  2842              CMP      r0,#0x42
0004a2  d077              BEQ      |L1.1428|
;;;517        	{
;;;518        	if(dt[2]=='C')
;;;519        		{
;;;520      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;521        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;522        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;523        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;524        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;525        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;526    			lcd_buffer[iii++]='N';
;;;527    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;528        			{
;;;529        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;530        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;531        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;532        			}
;;;533        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;534        			{
;;;535        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;536        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;537        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;538        			}
;;;539        		else 
;;;540        			{
;;;541        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;542        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;543        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;544        			} 
;;;545        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;546         	
;;;547        		if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;548        			{
;;;549        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;550       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;551        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;552        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;553        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;554       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;555       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;556       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;557       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;558       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;559       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;560        			}	                   
;;;561        		else      	
;;;562        			{
;;;563        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;564        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;565        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;566        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;567        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;568        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;569        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;570        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;571        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;572        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;573        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;574    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;575        			}
;;;576        		}
;;;577    
;;;578        	if(dt[2]=='S')
;;;579        		{
;;;580      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;581        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;582        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;583        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;584        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;585        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';

;;;587        			{

001d84  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1172
001d88  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1172
001d8a  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1172
001d8e  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1173
001d92  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1173
001d94  f80b8000          STRB     r8,[r11,r0]           ;1173
001d98  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1174
001d9c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1174
001d9e  f80b7001          STRB     r7,[r11,r1]           ;1174
001da2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1175
001da6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1175
001da8  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1175
001dac  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1176
001db0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1176
001db2  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1176
001db6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1177
001dba  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1177
001dbc  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1177
001dc0  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1178
001dc4  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1179
001dc8  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1179
001dcc  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1179
001dd0  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001dd4  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1180
001dd8  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1180
001dda  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1180
001ddc  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001de0  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1181
001de4  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1181
001de6  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1181
001de8  d303              BCC      |L1.7666|
001dea  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1181
001dee  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1181
                  |L1.7666|
001df2  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1182
001df6  4869              LDR      r0,|L1.8092|
001df8  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1182
001dfa  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1182
001dfe  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1182
001e00  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001e04  e455              B        |L1.5810|
;;;1187   
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1188   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1189   void community2lcd(char* in,
001e06  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1190   			char xy,
;;;1191   			char flash_pos,
;;;1192   			char flash_on)
;;;1193   {
001e08  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001e0a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001e0c  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001e0e  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1194   char temp;
;;;1195   char i;
;;;1196   //char n;
;;;1197   
;;;1198   
;;;1199   i=find(xy);
001e10  f7fffffe          BL       find
001e14  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1200   
;;;1201   //in1=192;
;;;1202   
;;;1203   //in2=34;
;;;1204   
;;;1205   
;;;1206   
;;;1207   temp=i;
001e16  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1208   
;;;1209   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1210   if(temp!=255)
;;;1211   while (*in)
;;;1212   	{
;;;1213   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001e18  4d61              LDR      r5,|L1.8096|
001e1a  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1210
001e1c  d106              BNE      |L1.7724|
001e1e  e008              B        |L1.7730|
                  |L1.7712|
001e20  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001e22  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1214   	temp++;
001e26  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001e2a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.7724|
001e2c  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1211
001e2e  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1211
001e30  d1f6              BNE      |L1.7712|
                  |L1.7730|
;;;1215       	}
;;;1216   
;;;1217   
;;;1218   
;;;1219   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001e32  485c              LDR      r0,|L1.8100|
001e34  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001e36  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001e38  d006              BEQ      |L1.7752|
001e3a  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001e3c  d004              BEQ      |L1.7752|
;;;1220   	{
;;;1221   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001e3e  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
001e42  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001e46  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.7752|
;;;1222   	}
;;;1223   
;;;1224   }
001e48  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1225   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1226   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1227   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001e4a  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1228   			short in2,
;;;1229   			short in3,
;;;1230   			short in4,
;;;1231   			char xy,
;;;1232   			char flash_pos)
;;;1233   {
001e4e  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001e50  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001e54  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001e56  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001e58  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1234   char i;
;;;1235   //char n;
;;;1236   
;;;1237   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1238   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1239   i=find(xy);
001e5a  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1240   
;;;1241   //in1=192;
;;;1242   
;;;1243   //in2=34;
;;;1244   
;;;1245   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001e5e  4b51              LDR      r3,|L1.8100|
;;;1246   	{
;;;1247   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001e60  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001e62  4c4f              LDR      r4,|L1.8096|
;;;1248   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1249   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1250   	}
;;;1251   else 
;;;1252   	{
;;;1253   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001e64  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1254   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1255   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001e66  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001e6a  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1245
001e6c  d109              BNE      |L1.7810|
001e6e  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1245  ; bFL2
001e70  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7810|
001e72  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1247
001e76  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1247
001e7a  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1247
001e7c  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1248
001e7e  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1249
001e80  e017              B        |L1.7858|
                  |L1.7810|
001e82  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1253
001e86  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1253
001e8a  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1253
001e8e  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1253
001e92  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1253
001e96  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1254
001e9a  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1254
001e9e  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1254
001ea2  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1254
001ea6  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001eaa  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001eae  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.7858|
;;;1256   	}
;;;1257   
;;;1258   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001eb2  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001eb4  d109              BNE      |L1.7882|
001eb6  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001eb8  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7882|
;;;1259   	{
;;;1260   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
001eba  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001ebe  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001ec2  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1261   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001ec4  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1262   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001ec6  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001ec8  e017              B        |L1.7930|
                  |L1.7882|
;;;1263   	}
;;;1264   else 
;;;1265   	{
;;;1266   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001eca  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001ece  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001ed2  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001ed6  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001eda  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001ede  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1267   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001ee2  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001ee6  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001eea  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001eee  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1268   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001ef0  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001ef4  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001ef8  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7930|
;;;1269   	}
;;;1270   
;;;1271   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
001efa  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
001efc  d109              BNE      |L1.7954|
001efe  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001f00  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7954|
;;;1272   	{
;;;1273   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
001f02  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001f06  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001f0a  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1274   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
001f0c  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1275   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
001f0e  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001f10  e017              B        |L1.8002|
                  |L1.7954|
;;;1276   	}
;;;1277   else 
;;;1278   	{
;;;1279   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
001f12  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001f16  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001f1a  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001f1e  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001f22  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001f26  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1280   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001f2a  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001f2e  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
001f32  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001f36  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1281   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001f38  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001f3c  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001f40  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.8002|
;;;1282   	}
;;;1283   
;;;1284   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
001f42  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
001f44  d109              BNE      |L1.8026|
001f46  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001f48  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.8026|
;;;1285   	{
;;;1286   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001f4a  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1287   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001f4c  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001f4e  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
001f52  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1288   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
001f54  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.8022|
;;;1289   	}
;;;1290   else 
;;;1291   	{
;;;1292   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1293   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1294   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1295   	}
;;;1296   }
001f56  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.8026|
001f5a  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1292
001f5e  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1292
001f62  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1292
001f66  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1292
001f68  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1293
001f6c  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1293
001f70  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1293
001f72  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1293
001f76  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1293
001f7a  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1293
001f7c  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1294
001f80  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1294
001f84  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1294
001f86  e7e6              B        |L1.8022|
;;;1297   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1298   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1299   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
001f88  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1300   {
001f8a  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1301   char i;
;;;1302   i=find(xy);
001f8c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1303   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
001f90  4903              LDR      r1,|L1.8096|
001f92  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L1.8104|
001f94  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
001f98  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
                  |L1.8090|
;;;1304   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1305   }
001f9a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.8092|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.8096|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8100|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.8104|
001fa8  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1304
001fac  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1304
001fae  e7f4              B        |L1.8090|
;;;1306   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1337   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1338   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
001fb0  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1339   {
;;;1340   char i;
;;;1341   char n;
;;;1342   
;;;1343   i=(20*y)+x;
001fb2  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001fb6  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001fba  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1344   
;;;1345   n=*((char*)&in);
001fbc  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1346   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001fc0  48d8              LDR      r0,|L1.8996|
001fc2  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
001fc6  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
001fc8  49d7              LDR      r1,|L1.9000|
001fca  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1347   i--;
001fcc  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001fd0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1348   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001fd2  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001fd6  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001fd8  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1349   i--;
001fda  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001fde  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1350   
;;;1351   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
001fe0  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1352   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001fe4  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001fe8  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001fea  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1353   i--;
001fec  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001ff0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1354   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001ff2  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001ff6  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001ff8  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1355   i--;
001ffa  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001ffe  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1356   
;;;1357   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
002000  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1358   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002004  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
002008  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00200a  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1359   i--;
00200c  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002010  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1360   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
002012  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
002016  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
002018  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1361   i--;
00201a  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00201e  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1362   
;;;1363   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
002020  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1364   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002024  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
002028  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00202a  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1365   i--;
00202c  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
002030  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1366   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
002032  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
002036  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002038  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1367   i--;
;;;1368   }
00203a  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1369   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1383   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1384   void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
00203c  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1385   {
;;;1386   char i;
;;;1387   
;;;1388   i=(20*y)+x;
00203e  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
002042  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
002046  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1389   
;;;1390   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
002048  4ab6              LDR      r2,|L1.8996|
00204a  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
00204e  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
002050  4bb5              LDR      r3,|L1.9000|
002052  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;1391   i--;
002054  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
002058  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1392   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
00205a  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
00205e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002060  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
;;;1393   i--;
;;;1394   }
002062  e79a              B        |L1.8090|
;;;1395   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1441   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1442   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
002064  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1443   {
;;;1444   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
002066  49b1              LDR      r1,|L1.9004|
002068  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
00206a  4baf              LDR      r3,|L1.9000|
00206c  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
002070  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
002074  428a              CMP      r2,r1
002076  d104              BNE      |L1.8322|
002078  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00207c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1445   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1446   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1447   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1448   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1449   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1450   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1451   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1452   }
002080  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8322|
002082  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1445
002084  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1445
002086  d106              BNE      |L1.8342|
002088  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1445
00208c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1445
002090  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1445
002094  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8342|
002096  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1446
002098  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1446
00209a  d106              BNE      |L1.8362|
00209c  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1446
0020a0  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1446
0020a4  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1446
0020a8  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8362|
0020aa  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1447
0020ac  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1447
0020ae  d106              BNE      |L1.8382|
0020b0  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1447
0020b4  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1447
0020b8  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1447
0020bc  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8382|
0020be  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1448
0020c0  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1448
0020c2  d106              BNE      |L1.8402|
0020c4  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1448
0020c8  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1448
0020cc  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1448
0020d0  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8402|
0020d2  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1449
0020d4  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1449
0020d6  d106              BNE      |L1.8422|
0020d8  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1449
0020dc  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1449
0020e0  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1449
0020e4  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8422|
0020e6  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1450
0020e8  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1450
0020ea  d106              BNE      |L1.8442|
0020ec  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1450
0020f0  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1450
0020f4  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1450
                  |L1.8440|
0020f8  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8442|
0020fa  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1451
0020fc  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1451
0020fe  d1fb              BNE      |L1.8440|
002100  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1451
002104  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1451
002108  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1451
00210c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1453   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1455   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1456   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
00210e  4b88              LDR      r3,|L1.9008|
;;;1457   {
;;;1458   ind_pointer--;
002110  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002112  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002116  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
002118  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1459   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
00211a  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
00211c  dc02              BGT      |L1.8484|
00211e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002122  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.8484|
;;;1460   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
002124  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002126  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
002128  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
00212a  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1461   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
00212c  4a81              LDR      r2,|L1.9012|
00212e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
002132  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
002134  487d              LDR      r0,|L1.9004|
002136  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
002138  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
00213a  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
00213c  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1462   
;;;1463   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
00213e  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
002140  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
002142  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1464   }
002144  4770              BX       lr
;;;1465   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1466   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1467   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
002146  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1468   {
;;;1469   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
002148  4d79              LDR      r5,|L1.9008|
00214a  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
00214e  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
002152  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
002154  4d77              LDR      r5,|L1.9012|
002156  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
00215a  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
00215c  4c73              LDR      r4,|L1.9004|
00215e  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
002160  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
002162  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
002164  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1470   ind=(i_enum)tind;
002166  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1471   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
002168  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1472   index_set=tindex_set;
00216a  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1473   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
00216c  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1474   }
00216e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1475   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1476   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1477   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
002170  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1478   {
002174  4680              MOV      r8,r0
002176  460f              MOV      r7,r1
002178  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1479   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1480   clr_scrn();
00217a  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1481   
;;;1482   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
00217e  4c6a              LDR      r4,|L1.9000|
;;;1483   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002180  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.8580|
;;;1484   	{
;;;1485   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
002184  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
002188  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
00218c  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1483
002190  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1483
002192  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1483
002194  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8580|
;;;1486   	}
;;;1487   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002196  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8602|
;;;1488   	{
;;;1489   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00219a  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
00219e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
0021a2  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1487
0021a6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1487
0021a8  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1487
0021aa  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8602|
;;;1490   	}
;;;1491   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0021ac  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8624|
;;;1492   	{
;;;1493   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
0021b0  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
0021b4  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
0021b8  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1491
0021bc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1491
0021be  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1491
0021c0  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8624|
;;;1494   	}
;;;1495   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0021c2  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8646|
;;;1496   	{
;;;1497   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
0021c6  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
0021ca  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
0021ce  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1495
0021d2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1495
0021d4  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1495
0021d6  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8646|
;;;1498   	}
;;;1499   
;;;1500   
;;;1501   }
0021d8  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1502   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1518   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1519   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
0021dc  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1520   {
0021de  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1521   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1522   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1523   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1524   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);
0021e0  f04f0564          MOV      r5,#0x64
0021e4  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
0021e8  4d53              LDR      r5,|L1.9016|
0021ea  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1525   show_mess_p1=p1;
0021ec  4c53              LDR      r4,|L1.9020|
0021ee  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1526   show_mess_p2=p2;
0021f0  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.9024|
0021f2  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1527   show_mess_p3=p3;
0021f4  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.9028|
0021f6  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1528   show_mess_p4=p4;
0021f8  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.9032|
0021fa  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1529   }
0021fc  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1530   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1557   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1558   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
0021fe  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1559   {
002202  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1560   char iii;
;;;1561   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1562   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1563   		
;;;1564   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1565   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1566   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1567   tempii*=32;
002204  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1568   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
002208  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
00220c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1569        
;;;1570   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
00220e  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
002210  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002212  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1571   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
002216  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
002218  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
00221c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1572   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
002220  4669              MOV      r1,sp
002222  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
002226  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1573   
;;;1574   iii=find(simbol);
00222a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00222c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1575   
;;;1576   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002230  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.9000|
002232  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
002236  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00223a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00223c  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1577   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00223e  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
002242  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002246  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002248  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1578   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00224a  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
00224e  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002252  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
002254  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1579   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
002258  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
00225c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002260  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002262  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1580   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002266  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00226a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00226c  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1581   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00226e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002272  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002274  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1582   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002276  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00227a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00227c  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1583   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
00227e  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
002282  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002286  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
002288  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1584   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
00228a  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
00228e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002292  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002296  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1585   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00229a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00229e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0022a0  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
0022a2  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1586   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
0022a6  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
0022aa  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0022ac  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
0022ae  d303              BCC      |L1.8888|
0022b0  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
0022b4  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.8888|
;;;1587   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
0022b8  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
0022bc  4923              LDR      r1,|L1.9036|
0022be  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0022c0  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
0022c4  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0022c6  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1588   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
0022ca  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
0022ce  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0022d0  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1589   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0022d2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0022d6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0022d8  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1590   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0022da  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0022de  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0022e0  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1591   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
0022e4  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
0022e8  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0022ec  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0022ee  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1592   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0022f0  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0022f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0022f6  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1593   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
0022f8  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0022fc  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
0022fe  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1594   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
002302  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
002306  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
00230a  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
00230e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1595   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
002312  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
002316  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002318  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00231a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1596      		     		
;;;1597   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00231e  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1598   }	
002320  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.8996|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.9000|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.9004|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.9008|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.9012|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.9016|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L1.9020|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L1.9024|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L1.9028|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.9032|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L1.9036|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|

                  |L3.152|

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L5.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L5.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L6.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L6.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L7.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L7.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L7.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L7.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L7.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L7.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L7.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L7.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L7.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma

	ENDP
